VoiceOfAbsolute.synopsis: Before entering the goblin camp, a scene triggers in which the party hear the voice of the Absolute, and experience a vision of its Chosen Three (Ketheric, Gortash and Orin). The voice orders the player to help the three find the Orpheus artefact and to seek 'the path of illumination'.If a party member in the group has the Orpheus box in their inventory, they take it into their hands. It glows brighter and brighter, and then the voice and visions stop. The light from the box then fades, and the player(s) discuss the apparent protection the box provided from the Absolute’s influence.If no party member in the group has the Orpheus box in their inventory,and Shadowheart isn't alive to show up, the visions and voice will cause the party to pass out and experience a forced camp night where they receive the box.NOTE: this dialogue contains narrator nodes that're intended to be player-forward in the medium term until NPC assets are available for cinematics.
VoiceOfAbsolute.how_to_trigger: Enter the goblin camp across stone bridge OR:Teleport to one of the following location (7 zone trigger)S_GOB_Orpheus_KethericCity  - (-625; 1; 361)S_GOB_Orpheus_PlainsEntrance - (-138; 35; 476)S_GOB_Orpheus_SecludedGoblinEntrance - (-72; 13; 424)S_GOB_Orpheus_MountainPass - (-157; 25; 333)S_GOB_Orpheus_WindmillEntrance - (-45; 29; 452)S_GOB_Orpheus_BridgeEntrance - (-99; 13; 391)S_GOB_Orpheus_RisingRoad - (-176; 27; 541)

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox.synopsis: The party hears the voice of the Absolute, faint, in their minds.Shadowheart takes out the infernal puzzle box, it glows brighter and brighter, and then the voice stops. Player avatar questions Shadowheart about the box. If the player is not aware of Shadowheart being a Shar worshipper, then they can discover this here, if she tells them about the artefact.
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox.how_to_trigger: Enter the goblin camp via the stone bridge after the checkpoint: 1. With an unrecruited (but alive) Shadowheart 2. With Shadowheart in the party and nearby

automatic_ordering.reasoning: Both of the provided sessions are triggered when the party reaches the goblin camp, but they occur under opposite conditions. The 'VoiceOfAbsolute' session is the standard trigger where the Absolute’s voice is heard and, if no party member already has the Orpheus (infernal puzzle) box (or under certain conditions like Shadowheart not being available), the box is received under dramatic circumstances. In contrast, 'VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox' specifically triggers when Shadowheart is in the party and present (and presumably already has the box), causing a variation in the dialogue where her possession of the box is revealed and discussed. Because these two sessions are triggered by mutually exclusive conditions – one occurs when Shadowheart with her box is present and the other when she is not – they cannot both occur in the same narrative path. There is no indication that one must strictly precede the other; rather, the conditions determine which session plays, making them mutually exclusive alternatives.

VoiceOfAbsolute_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player suddenly halts as they experince a deafening ringing sound in their head. They wince in pain.

VoiceOfAbsolute_15.speaker: Narrator
VoiceOfAbsolute_15.text: There is no escape from my voice. There is no escape from your destiny.
VoiceOfAbsolute_15.context: CinematicNodeContext: Characters look on the verge of collapsing. NodeContext: Faint, yet authoritative. The voice of a omnipotent, yet unseen being.

VoiceOfAbsolute_31.text: Hear my voice. Obey my command.
VoiceOfAbsolute_31.context: CinematicNodeContext: Characters look on the verge of collapsing. NodeContext: Faint, yet authoritative. The voice of a omnipotent, yet unseen being.

VoiceOfAbsolute_25.speaker: Narrator
VoiceOfAbsolute_25.text: *The voice is irresistible. You recognise the overwhelming authority that you've used on others, only infinitely stronger...*
VoiceOfAbsolute_25.context: InternalNodeContext: If the player used their illithid persuasion skills before this, the narrator notes that what they're feeling now feels like the flipside of that power they used.

VoiceOfAbsolute_11.speaker: Narrator
VoiceOfAbsolute_11.text: *Your vision clouds, leaving you in a dark, featureless shadowscape. Nothingness in every direction.*
VoiceOfAbsolute_11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player on the bridge affected by voice of absolute while narrator speaks over (no visuals of the actual vision itself until assets are available)InternalNodeContext: These narrator nodes are intended for medium-term use until the relevant NPCs are designed and cast. Ultimately they'll be replaced with cinematics, but the narrator nodes should be recorded and included when this dialogue is patched in,

VoiceOfAbsolute_0.speaker: Narrator
VoiceOfAbsolute_0.text: *Then, there are three figures before you. An armoured male elf, exuding power and command. A handsome younger man with a quick, easy smile. And a pale young woman with even paler eyes...*
VoiceOfAbsolute_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player on the bridge affected by voice of absolute while narrator speaks over (no visuals of the actual vision itself until assets are available)InternalNodeContext: These narrator nodes are intended for medium-term use until the relevant NPCs are designed and cast. Ultimately they'll be replaced with cinematics, but the narrator nodes should be recorded and included when this dialogue is patched in,

VoiceOfAbsolute_13.text: These are my Chosen. They speak for me.
VoiceOfAbsolute_13.context: CinematicNodeContext: The vision of Ketheric/Gortash/Orin is ongoing while the voice speaks in VOInternalNodeContext: Note - the vision referenced in the cinematic context will not be present initially - narrator nodes will be used as stand-ins, medium-term

VoiceOfAbsolute_38.text: Aid their search for the weapon, and you will be worthy to stand beside them. In my presence.

VoiceOfAbsolute_39.speaker: Narrator
VoiceOfAbsolute_39.text: *The visions fade and the voice falters as a strange energy swells around you. The many-sided artefact - somehow, you understand it's repelling the presence.*
VoiceOfAbsolute_39.context: CinematicNodeContext: A strange glowing energy pushes away the voice and mindmeld sfx. Player stops wincing in pain, reacts with surprise

VoiceOfAbsolute_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: The gith artefact levitates away from the party (specific bearer unidentified) and holds a short distance away. It pulses with bright, otherworldly light.

VoiceOfAbsolute_30.text: My power grows. My forces gather. The reckoning draws near...
VoiceOfAbsolute_30.context: CinematicNodeContext: The voice fades, and with it, the painful ringing. Character and the others stop wincing/reacting to pain, and look around in  bewilderment. The artefact is suddenly in the player's hands - they react with surprise.NodeContext: The voice from before speaks again, but broken and distant.

VoiceOfAbsolute_7.speaker: Lae'zel
VoiceOfAbsolute_7.text: The voice is quelled. The artefact's doing...

VoiceOfAbsolute_29.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_29.text: That voice... those visions. What just happened?

VoiceOfAbsolute_27.speaker: Narrator
VoiceOfAbsolute_27.text: *No answer presents itself. The artefact is dormant. The voice and visions are gone.*

VoiceOfAbsolute_28.speaker: Narrator
VoiceOfAbsolute_28.text: *Whatever power the artefact possesses, it shows no sign of it now.*
VoiceOfAbsolute_28.context: CinematicNodeContext: Close-up of box in player's hands

VoiceOfAbsolute_33.speaker: Astarion
VoiceOfAbsolute_33.text: How is it shielding us? And why? Not that I'm complaining.

VoiceOfAbsolute_8.speaker: Wyll
VoiceOfAbsolute_8.text: Gone - just like that. That relic works in mysterious ways.

VoiceOfAbsolute_20.speaker: Gale
VoiceOfAbsolute_20.text: The artefact is... protecting us? And not a moment too soon.

VoiceOfAbsolute_41.context: CinematicNodeContext: A strange glowing energy pushes away the visions. Party reacts with surprise.InternalNodeContext: Marked impossible for now due to unavailablilty of dead tribunal assets.

VoiceOfAbsolute_26.speaker: Narrator
VoiceOfAbsolute_26.text: *The pain in your head swells, pushing out any thoughts. The three figures fade away...*
VoiceOfAbsolute_26.context: CinematicNodeContext: A strange glowing energy pushes away the voice and mindmeld sfx. Player stops wincing in pain, reacts with surpriseInternalNodeContext: These narrator nodes are intended for medium-term use until the relevant NPCs are designed and cast. Ultimately they'll be replaced with cinematics, but the narrator nodes should be recorded and included when this dialogue is patched in,

VoiceOfAbsolute_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Visions of figures fade/scene grows dark as player starts to lose consciousnessInternalNodeContext: Marked impossible for now as assets for cinemartics are unavailable

VoiceOfAbsolute_32.speaker: Lae'zel
VoiceOfAbsolute_32.text: By Vlaakith, get out of my head!
VoiceOfAbsolute_32.context: NodeContext: Upset, head is in pain.

VoiceOfAbsolute_19.speaker: Karlach
VoiceOfAbsolute_19.text: My head... oh gods, my head!

VoiceOfAbsolute_6.speaker: Astarion
VoiceOfAbsolute_6.text: What are you doing?! My head - I can't...
VoiceOfAbsolute_6.context: NodeContext: Ferocious start, but quickly overcome by the power attacking his mind. He's about to faint.

VoiceOfAbsolute_24.speaker: Narrator
VoiceOfAbsolute_24.text: *...then there is nothing. Only darkness and silence.*
VoiceOfAbsolute_24.context: CinematicNodeContext: Party collapses and  loses consciousness/cut to black.InternalNodeContext: Scene shifts to camp. where the player receives the box. These narrator nodes are intended for medium-term use until the relevant NPCs are designed and cast. Ultimately they'll be replaced with cinematics, but the narrator nodes should be recorded and included when this dialogue is patched in,

VoiceOfAbsolute_18.context: CinematicNodeContext: Party collapses and loses consciousness/cut to black.InternalNodeContext: Marked impossible for now as assets for cinemartics are unavailable

VoiceOfAbsolute_36.speaker: Gale
VoiceOfAbsolute_36.text: My brain is bursting from my temples...

VoiceOfAbsolute_23.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The player experiences a vision of Ketheric, Gortash and Orin in a TBD environment while the voice of the Absolute continues to speak. Note: glimpses of the three presented as psionic imagery.
InternalNodeContext: Cinematic node flagged impossible until cinematics can be implemented

VoiceOfAbsolute_22.speaker: Narrator
VoiceOfAbsolute_22.text: *The voice is irresistible. Every word is drenched with a power and authority that you do not understand, but cannot deny.*
VoiceOfAbsolute_22.context: InternalNodeContext: The player hasn't used their illithid powers

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_37.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player suddenly halts as they experience a deafening ringing sound in their head. They wince in pain.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_96.text: Hear my voice. Obey my command.
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_96.context: CinematicNodeContext: Characters look on the verge of collapsing. NodeContext: Faint, yet authoritative. The voice of a omnipotent, yet unseen being.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_86.speaker: Narrator
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_86.text: *The voice is irresistible. You recognise the overwhelming authority that you've used on others, only infinitely stronger, and turned against you...*
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_86.context: InternalNodeContext: If the player used their illithid persuasion skills before this, the narrator notes that what they're feeling now feels like the flipside of that power they used.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_15.speaker: Narrator
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_15.text: *Your vision clouds, leaving you in a dark, featureless shadowscape. Nothingness in every direction.*
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_15.context: CinematicNodeContext: No cinematics until dead tribunal are designed. See state context for ongoing visual infoInternalNodeContext: These narrator nodes are intended for medium-term use until the relevant NPCs are designed and cast. Ultimately they'll be replaced with cinematics, but the narrator nodes should be recorded and included when this dialogue is patched in,

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_137.speaker: Narrator
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_137.text: *Then, there are three figures before you. An armoured male elf, exuding power and command. A handsome younger man with a quick, easy smile. And a pale young woman with even paler eyes...*
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_137.context: CinematicNodeContext: No cinematics until dead tribunal are designed. See state context for ongoing visual infoInternalNodeContext: These narrator nodes are intended for medium-term use until the relevant NPCs are designed and cast. Ultimately they'll be replaced with cinematics, but the narrator nodes should be recorded and included when this dialogue is patched in,

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_131.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The player experiences a vision of Ketheric, Gortash and Orin in a TBD environment while the voice of the Absolute continues to speak. Note: glimpses of the three presented as psionic imagery.
InternalNodeContext: Cinematic node flagged impossible until cinematics can be implemented

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_108.text: These are my Chosen. They speak for me.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_23.text: Aid their search for the Prism, and you will be worthy to stand beside them. In my presence.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_162.context: CinematicNodeContext: The vision fades. The player sees that the strange box Shadowheart has is levitating before her. It's pulsing with strange, otherworldly light.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_144.context: CinematicNodeContext: The vision fades. The player sees the gith artefact levitating, next to Shadowheart, who has just appeared.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_77.speaker: Narrator
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_77.text: *You feel energy pulsing from the artefact. Lifting the pain from you. Pushing the voice away.*

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_31.text: My power grows. My forces gather. The reckoning draws near...
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_31.context: CinematicNodeContext: See state contextInternalNodeContext: Voice grows more distant, fading outNodeContext: Unfazed, assured of victory.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_126.context: CinematicNodeContext: Voice, visions and pisonic magic fade entirely. The gith artefact is already back in SH's hands, and  has ceased glowing.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_16.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_16.text: Don't give me that look. I don't know what just happened any more than you do. We should keep going.
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_16.context: CinematicNodeContext: See state contextNodeContext: A little defensive

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_148.speaker: Lae'zel
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_148.text: The voice is gone - muted by this... this gith relic. Why does a half-elf carry it?

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_140.speaker: Karlach
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_140.text: Nice one, Shadowheart. That thing in your pocket seems powerful as hell.
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_140.context: NodeContext: It's a serious matter, so not too cheeky

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_125.speaker: Astarion
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_125.text: I don't know what that toy of hers is, but I'm glad it's on our side.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_146.speaker: Wyll
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_146.text: Isn't that something? The artefact scattered the voice to the four winds.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_72.speaker: Gale
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_72.text: That's an unusual artefact you have there, Shadowheart. A most unlikely protector...

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_67.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_67.text: You've got some explaining to do first - why do you carry a gith relic?

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_6.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_6.text: You've got some explaining to do first - what is that thing you have?

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_123.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_123.text: The vision... that voice - what was it?

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_98.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_98.text: I think that was the Absolute speaking to us... but we managed to shield ourselves. We should keep moving.
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_98.context: NodeContext: Troubled at what just happened, Eager to move past it.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_88.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_88.text: I'm not sure I want to know - but it's gone now. We should keep moving.
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_88.context: NodeContext: Troubled at what just happened, Eager to move past it.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_157.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_157.text: Hold on - that artefact seemed to stop the voice. What is it?

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_129.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_129.text: That power... is that what happens to others, when we use the parasite on them?
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_129.context: InternalNodeContext: Available only if the party used tadpole powers on an absolute follower previously.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_147.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_147.text: Perhaps, but whatever it was, I don't want to experience it again.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_166.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_166.text: Seems that trinket's important. Keep it close.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_34.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_34.text: Trust me, I will. Let's keep going.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_12.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_12.text: Hold on - at least tell me what it is first.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_26.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_26.text: I don't know... not exactly. All I know is it's important I get it back to Baldur's Gate. At any cost.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_18.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_18.text: Not good enough. Explain yourself, or I'll cut you loose.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_159.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_159.text: Wait. I don't know what this thing is. All I know is that I've to get it to Baldur's Gate, at any cost. That's all I have for you.
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_159.context: NodeContext: Displeased, Reluctantly sharing what she knows after being issued an ultimatum.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_173.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_173.text: My home - a cloister of Shar followers, hidden in the city.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_141.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_141.text: Why Baldur's Gate? What aren't you telling me?

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_124.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_124.text: I suppose if we're to continue together, I may as well tell you. I serve Shar. My home is a secret cloister in Baldur's Gate.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_161.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_161.text: A group of us were sent to retrieve the artefact. Now I'm the only one left. I can't afford to fail.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_0.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_0.text: If you don't know what it is, how do you have it?

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_84.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_84.text: Because it was our mission to retrieve it - me and... the others. I'm the only one who made it.
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_84.context: NodeContext: hesitates and trails off at the end - about to reveal her background.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_152.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_152.text: And exactly what did retrieving the artefact entail?

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_65.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_65.text: You must know something about what that thing is.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_27.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_27.text: There must be more to it - I need you to level with me.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_60.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_60.text: I... I am a servant of Shar. My home is a secret cloister in Baldur's Gate. I need to bring that artefact back there, no matter what.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_169.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_169.text: I can't tell you any more. This mission required utmost secrecy - we all submitted to having our memories suppressed so that we couldn't betray Shar's confidence.
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_169.context: InternalNodeContext: If the player hasn't already heard about SH's memory loss.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_73.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_73.text: If I reach my contact in the city, I'll have my memories restored. Until then, I have to guard the artefact with my life.
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_73.context: InternalNodeContext: If the player hasn't already heard about SH's memory loss.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_22.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_22.text: There - you have the truth, for all it's worth. Let's continue.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_11.speaker: Gale
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_11.text: You worship Shar? Blimey. She and my beloved Mystra are not exactly friends.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_163.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_163.text: You've been lying to me. How long were you going to keep this secret?

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_149.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_149.text: Forever, ideally. And you assume too much about what I can and cannot tell.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_150.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_150.text: Secrecy is everything for Shar's children. It's our code, our creed, our shield.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_156.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_156.text: I even keep secrets from myself - I had my memories suppressed, so that nothing I knew could be used against the Dark Lady. Once I prove myself, my memories will be restored.
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_156.context: InternalNodeContext: This node only if the memory suppression beat wasn't established

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_132.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_132.text: I'm not sorry I kept this from you. Not one bit.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_71.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_71.text: Though perhaps that might change, if you can show an open mind.
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_71.context: NodeContext: Conceding jus a little towards the player's hurt feelings - but conditionally

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_46.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_46.text: Let's see how open-minded I can be then: tell me more about your Shar worship.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_48.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_48.text: Talk to me later. We've got more pressing matters to see to right now.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_134.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_134.text: We can discuss this later. But let's just try a little more honesty going forward.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_85.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_85.text: All we can do is try, I suppose...

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_1.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_1.text: I don't know how I feel about this.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_75.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_75.text: Who says you have to feel anything?

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_14.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_14.text: Gather your thoughts. Then perhaps we can talk some more.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_5.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_5.text: How did you come into possession of that artefact exactly?

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_81.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_81.text: There's nothing more I can tell you. All I remember is that I have to get back to my contact in the city.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_54.speaker: Lae'zel
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_54.text: I know those symbols - githyanki runes. Ancient as Vlaakith herself. You stole that from my people.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_21.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_21.text: Yes, and a lot of my people died in the process. I won't fail them - not after what I saw your kind do to them.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_120.speaker: Narrator
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_120.text: *A powerful artefact indeed, to have caught the attention of so many. Not least, the Absolute itself.*

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_58.speaker: Narrator
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_58.text: *The three figures in the vision - the Chosen - are searching for it. With the cultists' aid, it will not be long before they find it, before they find you.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_99.speaker: Narrator
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_99.text: *You have evaded them so far. Thanks, it seems, to the artefact itself. But how long can such protection last?*

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_115.speaker: Narrator
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_115.text: *Shadowheart has made her position clear - she will see that it is taken to its destination. At any cost.*

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_45.speaker: Narrator
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_45.text: *No doubt the githyanki will seek to reclaim that which is theirs.*

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_107.speaker: Narrator
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_107.text: *And you still do not know what it even is.*

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_74.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_74.text: Enough, both of you. We need to work together.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_110.speaker: Lae'zel
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_110.text: For now. But any crimes against my kin will be answered for, in time.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_49.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_49.text: I just saved you. Keep that in mind, next time you want to air your grievances.
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_49.context: CinematicNodeContext: Looking at Lae'zelNodeContext: Sharp retort

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_118.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_118.text: Agreed. There's too much at stake for petty squabbles.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_62.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_62.text: Keep that thing safe - seems we'll need it.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_41.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_41.text: Trust me, I'll guard it with my life. Let's keep going.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_19.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_19.text: Give me the artefact. Better if I hold onto it.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_79.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_79.text: I trust you more than most, but I'm sorry - that's too much to ask. This is my responsibility.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_76.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_76.text: Just take care of it. Seems like it's as important to me as it is to you.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_25.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_25.text: I wouldn't quite say that, but it'll be safe with me. Let's go.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_155.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart puts the box away

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_47.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_47.text: I can't trust you. Best if we travel separately for now.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_101.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_101.text: If you insist. Don't expect to fare well without me to save you.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_36.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_36.text: I want to know about your Shar worship before we go any farther.
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_36.context: InternalNodeContext: SH's Shar worship wasn't discussed yet.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_117.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_117.text: If you insist. But make it quick - we have far bigger concerns.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_40.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_40.text: Out of the question. This is my mission - I won't just give it away.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_80.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_80.text: Tell me about the artefact. What just happened?

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_24.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_24.text: It's been some time since I met another faithful of Shar. Are you versed in her teachings?

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_171.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_171.text: Of course I am. But we can talk about this later - let's go.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_153.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_153.text: I don't care who you worship. Tell me about that artefact.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_100.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_100.text: I didn't agree to join up with a Shar worshipper.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_69.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_69.text: Then it's your own fault for not asking.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_127.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_127.text: Now that the truth's out, tell me more.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_9.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_9.text: In future, I expect you to be honest. Let's leave it at that for now.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_3.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_3.text: Your faith is your own concern, not mine.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_20.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_20.text: True. I didn't think you'd react so pragmatically. Perhaps I should have told you sooner.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_170.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_170.text: Shar is an abomination. You deceived me.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_145.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_145.text: Your blindness as much as my deception, Selûnite. We can talk about this later - if you're willing.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_102.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_102.text: I bow to Shar also. The Dark Lady must favour us, to have brought us together.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_42.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_42.text: I... yes, she must. I'll offer thanks to her in my prayers - and we should speak more later. Alone, ideally.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_56.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_56.text: No need to thank me - this is out of pure necessity - pure desperation, in fact.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_78.speaker: Wyll
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_78.text: A Shar worshipper? Not my usual quarry - nor my usual ally.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_168.speaker: Astarion
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_168.text: Heavens forbid. We're all entitled to our secrets.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_119.speaker: Karlach
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_119.context: NodeContext: Reacting to the revelation Shadowheart is a Sharran. Karlach might be a little awkwardly victorious here; this isn't the right time for her outburst.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_57.speaker: Lae'zel
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_57.text: The goddess of secrets? How telling.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_111.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_111.text: Then go ahead. It won't change what I have to say to you.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_83.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_83.text: I'll have answers, or I'll have blood.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_95.speaker: Player
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_95.text: That was far from nothing. Tell me what you know, please.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_94.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_94.text: I told you already, now forget it. Let's keep going.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_133.speaker: Shadowheart
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_133.text: I imagine you must have questions. We should talk.

VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_87.speaker: Narrator
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_87.text: *The voice is irresistible. Every word is drenched with a power and authority that you do not understand, but cannot deny.*
VoiceOfAbsolute_ShadowheartHasBox_87.context: InternalNodeContext: The player hasn't used their illithid powers
